content: Which iconic British rock band released albums such as "Dark Side of the Moon" and "The Wall" in the 1970s?

That would be Pink Floyd, one of the most influential and commercially successful bands in the history of music. "Dark Side of the Moon" and "The Wall" are indeed two of their most iconic albums, both released in the 1970s. "Dark Side of the Moon" was released in 1973 and remained on the Billboard charts for an astonishing 948 weeks, while "The Wall" came out in 1979 and featured the hit single "Another Brick in the Wall, Part 2." Both albums are known for their innovative sound, complex themes, and elaborate conceptual narratives.
